components.Name: AngularJs 2
components.ShortDescription: Angular is a development platform for building mobile and desktop web applications.

components.Name: Node Js
components.ShortDescription: Node.jsÂ® is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient. Node.js' package ecosystem, npm, is the largest ecosystem of open source libraries in the world.

components.Name: Typescript
components.ShortDescription: TypeScript is a free and open source programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft. It is a strict superset of JavaScript, and adds optional static typing and class-based object-oriented programming to the language.

components.Name: Twitter Bootstrap
components.ShortDescription: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JavaScript framework for developing responsive, mobile-first web sites. Bootstrap is completely free to download and use!
